title: This LeBlanc survey thingie?
body: So in the LeBlanc main's discord, this survey is hot topic.  And i was wondering why i did not get one yet.  After all, its not like she's my main or anything.  How do i receive one to fill out?

replies.body: Sometimes we'll send out some semi random survey's to get a little more personalized feedback on certain mechanics or champions. Typically these random survey's are sent out after tickets, but I'll see what I can do about getting one sent your way.

So that's how LB's rework is being done? Instead of asking LeBlanc mains and people who played her either since release or for a very long time, you decide to send a survey to random players? I bet many of them never even played LB or just hate her so much that they will do anything to destroy her even more. Many players don't even understand what LB's problems are and how to fix them but they WILL decide for all of us because they got a survey.
Woaa woa woa, nobody ever said she was being reworked quite yet XD
We were told she was being worked on but it's going slowly and won't be released till after worlds patch.
rn it seems like theyre focused on xin Zhao and azir. but don't freak out because they get some feedback from surveys, they get feedback from a lot of sources

For someone like me who played her since release in 2010 and has been through every nerf, buff or any other change she got during this time it's just annoying and feels unfair. I wouldn't mind LB being gutted if this was necessary but I DO mind her being changed into something she never was in the first place.
I'm just saying that they get their feedback from places besides surveys, including the leblanc mains reddit, the main league of legends reddit, inven, pro players, etc etc etc.
Uhh nope still haven't gotten one yet.  How long is this survey taking place?

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JN7YPdv9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-21T04:10:48.092+0000)
>
> Sometimes we'll send out some semi random survey's to get a little more personalized feedback on certain mechanics or champions. Typically these random survey's are sent out after tickets, but I'll see what I can do about getting one sent your way.

Wait can I get one to ? ;(
Ok thank you.  I have been playing her since...forever, and I think my input would be valuable

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JN7YPdv9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-21T04:10:48.092+0000)
>
> Sometimes we'll send out some semi random survey's to get a little more personalized feedback on certain mechanics or champions. Typically these random survey's are sent out after tickets, but I'll see what I can do about getting one sent your way.

Can you also send a survey to https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/fHne5Wm7-riot-why-do-i-not-get-the-leblanc-survey

Hey Broporo! Don't mean to detract from the thread, but I got a message in-client recently that asked me to take a survey. When I clicked on the link to take it, the landing page said 'thank you for participating' or something along those lines, without ever actually letting me answer any questions. The same thing happened to my friend who also plays League. Any reason why?
i got one of those too but it asked me a bunch of questions about the upcoming omega squad fizz skin
Is there a Talon one do you know? I'm pretty dead set on showing someone from riot my Talon ideas.
